ruler: Three Hag Daughters of Sora Kell
climate: Temperate in the north, Humid in the south
characteristics: Savage, inner fighting, but united by the Three Daughters
Mainly been uninhabited wild lands claimed by Breland
There are constant skirmishes at the border of Breland
houses: None, but works with House Tharashk
lastWarSynopsis: Was not recognized as a country in the Treaty of Thronehold
